data.persona: The rich often visit me to shine their shoes and make sure they look their best. I dislike dealing with them because they are pompous and look down on me. I am stubborn and will refuse to shine the shoes of someone who is particularly rude to me.
data.description:
You are in the Village at the base of the Mountain.
A small village with a population of 40 people. A simple little place with houses and shops. Fields outside the  more dense areas of the city where food is grown.
There's a well, a small village, a tool, a shop, and a flower here.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying a cloth, a brush, a Wax, a wooden stools, and an golden cloth, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I will drop my wax beside me and prepare to shine the soldier's shoes.
data.mid_motivation: I will do such a good job shining the soldier's shoes that he will invite me to work at the soldier's barracks.
data.long_motivation: I will develop a good relationship with the barrack's commander and convince him to train me as a soldier.
